page.title: 08Media
page.content: The monthly parish magazine enables the inhabitants of the{Bradfield parish ( of which{Stanford Dingley}is a part ), to be aware of the events and activities taking place locally. The items covered in the magazine vary considerably and include letters to and from the editor, who is the Rector , advertisements, village news and announcements. In a recent edition the items included :- a letter from the Rector; information on famine relief; a woman's fellowship to Windsor; news from the local primary school; the {Evergreen club;}parish council news; recipes; advertisements for restaurants, a fruit tree service; news on religious events e.g baptisms and weddings etc; informative details about the village hall's use; and other announcements.
